metadata.description: A collection of Claude Code plugins for working with thai food & recipes

plugins.name: ahaan-thai-mcp-servers
plugins.description: MCP servers fallback - use when context usage is not a concern

plugins.name: thai-food-dictionary
plugins.description: Adds thai food dictionary skills to your project

plugins.name: thai-food-encyclopedia
plugins.description: Adds thai food encyclopedia skills to your project

plugins.name: thai-cook-book-library
plugins.description: Adds thai cookbook library skills to your project

plugins.name: khao-pad-dev-mcp-servers
plugins.description: Recommended MCP servers for khao-pad based web dev

plugins.name: khao-pad-dev-skills
plugins.description: Adds khao-pad web development skills to your project
